name: Kavisha Gupta
brief_summary: Diligent college student looking for opportunities, developing a positive outlook, and a variety of strong skills.

education.institution: SRM Institute of Science & Technology, Kattankulathur

description: Launched a career in data & analytics through PwC's intensive training program (IT Fundamentals, RDBMS, Programming Fundamentals, Data Engineering).

internships.position: Data Engineer, AICTE & Ministry of Housing and Urban Affairs
description: Gained experience cleaning data sets to prepare them for integration into larger datasets.
Translated complex data into clear visuals and reports using data visualization tools (e.g., Power BI) to inform strategic initiatives.
Made the user experience (UX) and visuals you see online (HTML, CSS, JavaScript).
Created the behind-the-scenes functionality (Python) that makes websites work.

projects.name: Fake News Detection
projects.description: The project leverages Python for data preprocessing, feature extraction, and machine learning model training to classify news as fake or real.

projects.name: Weather Forecast
projects.description: I used HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for the weather forecasting webpage (frontend).
